name: iterm-control
description: Sends a control character (like Ctrl-C) to the active iTerm terminal session.
author: Shinkai

letter.description: Control key to send: C (interrupt), D (EOF), Z (suspend), L (clear), U (clear line), R (redraw)

success.description: True if control character was sent to active terminal session, false if no active session

message.description: Details about control operation result, includes error message if failed
